## CameraRotationAnimation.(constructor)

Creates a new `CameraRotationAnimation` object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(mapView: MapView, m_mapControls: MapControls | undefined, options: CameraRotationAnimationOptions, name?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mapView | [MapView](./harp-mapview.mapview.md) | \[\[MapView\]\] which will be affected by the animation. |
|  m\_mapControls | [MapControls](./harp-map-controls.mapcontrols.md) \| undefined | \[\[MapControls\]\] this animation will be taking control of. |
|  options | [CameraRotationAnimationOptions](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.md) | Animation's options. |
|  name | string | Animation's name. |
